ModMetaData.name: Dirty Talk
ModMetaData.author: Az
ModMetaData.description:
A nearly unchanged update of DirtyTalk by TeH_Dav. I am not the original creator; if they request this be taken down I will do so.
------------------------------------------------- Adds speakup functionality to RJW sexual interactions
Interaction icons are drawn by OTYOTY, and come from this mod: https://www.loverslab.com/topic/145286-mod-oty-rjw-symbols/
